mapper.insert: INSERT INTO public.mart_info (p_seq, m_seq, m_name, a_seq, a_name, a_unit, a_price, p_year_month, add_col, p_date, m_type_code, m_type_name, m_gu_code, m_gu_name) VALUES (#{pSeq}, #{mSeq}, #{mName}, #{aSeq}, #{aName}, #{aUnit}, #{aPrice}, #{pYearMonth}, #{addCol}, #{pDate}, #{mTypeCode}, #{mTypeName}, #{mGuCode}, #{mGuName})
